successes.title: WakaWaka Power: the Best Compact Solar Power Station & Light
successes.description:
Super efficient Personal Solar Power Station to
charge your iPad, iPhone or any other smart phone. 
With excellent reading light.

Pledges.description: NEWSLETTER REWARD .  .  .  .  .  . .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  Stay tuned on the latest news, which celebrities rally behind WakaWaka, what happens in Haiti. You will hear it first.

EARLY BIRD - LIMITED EDITION .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .
Get WakaWaka Power in Yellow or Black delivered to your doorstep. Power to you!
LATE BIRD - LIMITED EDITION . . . . . . . . . Get WakaWaka Power in Yellow or Black delivered to your doorstep. Power to you!
FINAL LIMITED EDITION . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Get WakaWaka Power in Yellow or Black delivered to your doorstep. Power to you!
WAKAWAKA POWER .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  Get WakaWaka Power in Yellow or Black delivered to your doorstep. Power to you!

WAKAWAKA POWER & LIGHT SET . . . . . . . . . Get WakaWaka Power in Yellow or Black AND get an additional WakaWaka Light as a bonus reward. Never be without light again. Be prepared. Power & Light to you!
PERSONALIZED POWER   .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  .  . Get WakaWaka Power in Yellow of Black with your name on it. We'll add a black velvet pouch for safe keeping. Personal Power!

BLACKOUT PORTABLE EMERGENCY KIT . . . . . Be prepared for the next blackout. Stay informed, connected and... warm, where ever you are.Your reward is a classic WakaWaka Light, a WakaWaka Power, USB powered radio, USB heated gloves. check out the specs at the bottom. STAY CONNECTED - Power to you!

POWER DINNER IN NEW YORK  . . . . . . . . . . . .  September 2013 we will be in New York for the CLINTON GLOBAL INITIATIVE. We would like to invite you to have dinner with us. Exact day, time and place will be communicated with you. Of course we will send you a personalized WakaWaka Power in advance. (pls arrange your own transport & overnight stay).
